# PDFDisplayMode.twoUp

**Case**

A display mode where the document displays two pages side-by-side.

## Declaration

```swift
case twoUp
```

## Discussion

Vertical and horizontal scrolling apply only to the pair of displayed pages.

## Constants

- **PDFDisplayMode.singlePage**: A display mode where the document displays one page at a time horizontally and vertically.
- **PDFDisplayMode.singlePageContinuous**: A display mode where the document displays in continuous mode vertically, with single-page width horizontally.
- **PDFDisplayMode.twoUpContinuous**: A display mode where the document displays in continuous mode vertically and displays two pages side-by-side horizontally.
